shortdesc.ph: Pushes the external raw video frame to the SDK.

p.codeblock: virtual int pushVideoFrame(base::ExternalVideoFrame* frame, unsigned int videoTrackId = 0) = 0;
public abstract int PushVideoFrame(ExternalVideoFrame frame, uint videoTrackId = 0);
Future<void> pushVideoFrame( {required ExternalVideoFrame frame, int videoTrackId = 0});

dlentry.dd: If you need to push video frames in I422 format, you need to use this method; otherwise, use instead.

p.ph: To push the unencoded external raw video frame to the SDK, call , set enabled as , and set encodedFrame as .

To push the unencoded external raw video frame to the SDK, call to get the video track ID, set customVideoTrackId as the video track ID you want to publish in the of each channel, and set publishCustomVideoTrack as .

section.p: You can push the video frame either by calling this method or by calling . The difference is that the method does not support video data in texture format.

pd.p: The external raw video frame to be pushed. See .

plentry.pd: The video track ID returned by calling the method. The default value is 0.

ul.li: : Pushes the external raw video frame to the SDK successfully.
: Fails to push external raw video frame to the SDK.
